==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|こく|ご|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From {{compound|ja|国|語|tr1=koku|tr2=go|t1=nation|t2=language}}. The sense of "Mandarin" is derived from Taiwanese usage of the identical Chinese word {{zh-l|國語}}.
